lender.name: Megan
lender.loan_because: it's a great idea on a scale I can afford.

lender.name: Tara
lender.loan_because: I believe in supporting global fair trade, ending poverty, and living in solidarity.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of my two sons.

lender.name: Lenton Family
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping others succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I help the healthcare industry by reducing costs associated with manual processes. I work with software that connects Dr.'s and Insurance companies to increase efficiency and lower costs.

lender.name: Dirk
lender.loan_because: I like helping people grow their businesses in the developing world particularly Asia.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a banker making loans to large companies here in California.

lender.name: Prentiss Neuman
lender.loan_because: I feel it is a calling to give
lender.occupational_info: I am retired

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: the stories I read about people inspire me.
lender.occupational_info: Born and raised in Lurgan, Ireland, and now living in the United States, I work as an educational administrator helping teachers teach kids.

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: mitakuye oyasin

lender.name: Will
lender.loan_because: It is for now and times we shall never see...

lender.name: Laura
lender.occupational_info: I am a PhD student researching the economic experiences of recent immigrants to Canada. I am interested in studying the labour market outcomes for university-educated women from India, China and the Philippines.

lender.name: Phil & Meg
lender.loan_because: This year for Christmas we wanted to show our kids that it is better to give than to receive. This is our first time loaning.
lender.occupational_info: Phil is in the mortgage business, and I am a Professional Counselor.

lender.name: Emily C. Specchio Foundation
lender.occupational_info: The Emily C. Specchio Foundation is a 501(c)(3) not-for-profit organization dedicated to support scholarships and fellowships for students who want to change the world for the better. The foundation is named after Emily C. Specchio who inter-related the ideas of academic excellence with social responsibility. With this in mind, our mission is to encourage, identify and financially support university undergraduate and graduate students who pursue study and/or programs underlying the values of social justice both nationally and internationally.

lender.name: Eric
lender.occupational_info: Towson University History Major Political Science Major

lender.name: Thomas Gold
lender.loan_because: as a Kiva Fellow in the DR, I had the opportunity to follow the whole process of a loan step by step and I am well situated to vouch for the efficiency of Kiva P2P lending model.

lender.name: Jette
lender.loan_because: Helping others help themselves is the best form of aid. Being an entrepreneur myself, I know what a difference even just a little extra cash can make.

lender.name: Derek & Jesse
lender.loan_because: we want to leave the world a little better than we found it.

lender.name: Lynn
lender.loan_because: I believe it takes each of us to make a difference for all of us.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I want to support my fellow shepherds and shepherdesses.

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: I have been the beneficiary of many acts of kindness and want to give back by empowering others' dreams.

lender.name: mara
lender.loan_because: We're all in this together.

lender.name: John F.
lender.loan_because: I am thankful

lender.name: Fran
lender.loan_because: I can and like to help.

lender.name: Aine
lender.loan_because: I was attracted to the grassroots nature of this organization, the fact that it empowers others and harnesses the forces of the marketplace to make a difference in peoples lives. It gratifying to think that a small amount from me can make such a difference to someone else's life.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a lawyer

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: I care and I want to make a difference.

lender.name: Liya
lender.loan_because: I want to help improve the lives of others and help them achieve their goals through financial assistance.

lender.name: Shaina and Titus
lender.loan_because: My husband and I have been blessed with much more than we need and we want to do something to help others!
lender.occupational_info: I am in medical school!

lender.name: Joanne
lender.loan_because: I have been very lucky and I want to give others a better chance to succeed
lender.occupational_info: We study treatments that help people to live healthier lives

lender.name: Lucy
lender.loan_because: We are all in this world together and need to help each other. There are tyrants and dictatorships and just plain bad governments to try and succeed to bring a person/community down. That is just so wrong. Until the human race can get along, then maybe we are no better than the tyrants, dictators and just plain bad governments. I really don't like that idea. I would like to think that the people are better than that. That's why we need each other.
lender.occupational_info: See 'occupation'. Before that, I was in the service industry. Tending bar, waiting tables; I guess I've been helping people all my life.

lender.name: Bob
lender.loan_because: Gives an opportunity for people to pull themselves up with a bit of assistance.
lender.occupational_info: Retired but work, as a volunteer, on forestry planning.

lender.name: Mary Anne
lender.loan_because: Lending is a excellent way to produce positive change in this world without involving the "big boys" . One person reaching out to another.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: I don't yet have the means to travel and volunteer on my own yet, but I know that I still have the ability to help through Kiva!

lender.name: Ulf
lender.loan_because: Together we can change the world Together we must try Together we can save the world And help us all survive

lender.name: Wendy
lender.loan_because: it makes a difference.
lender.occupational_info: Meaningful.

lender.name: Tuomas
lender.loan_because:
It seems to me that microcredit is a relatively corruption-free method used to help out small businesses in developing countries and since all the money is paid to back to the lenders I hope any possible disturbance to local economies stays minimal. Simply donating money away can possible create dependancy. I hope what I do here doesn't.
But I'm not an expert, just someone who tries to do the right thing.

lender.name: Cheryl
lender.loan_because: I believe in independent women and the power of "goats". This is my first "loan". It was a Christmas gift; a gift that keeps on giving.

lender.name: Megan
lender.whereabouts: Sydney International Airport New South Wales

lender.name: Jeanne
lender.loan_because: I received a gift certificate so learned about Kiva. There are so many I would love to loan to !
lender.occupational_info: I looked after teenagers from difficult backgrounds for many years. the best job in the world.

lender.name: Josh & Mely
lender.loan_because: We have to help each other, because I am grateful for what I have. Because KIVA's idea of direct lending and well organized system seems more trustworthy than huge non-profit orgs.

lender.name: Jos
lender.loan_because: I like to help.
lender.occupational_info: I help people learn

lender.name: Rui
lender.loan_because: I hope I can help.
lender.occupational_info: I am a forester and a biologist. Presently I work mainly on environmental and technical divulgation.

lender.name: Soebroto
lender.loan_because: I need loan because I want to start to build a printing bussines by my self. For first step I will buy a set of computer for my job in design graphic background to apply in this printing bussiness design needed by customer. So optimize I can planning for more if first step is going success.
lender.occupational_info: My work is make a design and applying to printing media just like a customer need and wanted.

lender.name: Irina Yaacoub
lender.loan_because: I would like to help and believe that together we can make a difference!
lender.occupational_info: I am responsible for the marketing and promotion of electronic government services.

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: this is one step in the right direction for alleviating global poverty.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: There is enough wealth out there to provide each person enough income for a year if distributed evenly.. It feels great to help someone else - changing the world one life at a time! What you SOW you will also REAP!
lender.occupational_info: We have a trust set up that will own assets in order to generate income for community members. The trust has at least 1000 beneficiaries who will receive financial and logistical support through the trust. I am one of the directors who will make sure assets generate income for the trust. As employees, we do not benefit from the trust and receive only a market related salary as decided on by an outsourced auditor group. Our project has met approval for the self sustainable humanitarian development process.

lender.name: Joel
lender.occupational_info: I provide employeers with the information to provide a workplace free of hazards causing or likely to cause injury, illness, or death.

lender.name: Peter & Judy
lender.loan_because: Our granddaughters Taylor and Kendra selected the loan recipients. We hope they learn a lot from their involvement in the project!

lender.name: Charlotte
lender.occupational_info: I make TV programmes and documentaries.

lender.name: Ellen
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people to make their lives better and in doing so, to make the world a better place.

lender.name: Team Kenny
lender.loan_because: http://kennyb.chipin.com/kenny-b-memorial

lender.name: Narasimharao
lender.loan_because: Photography(CAMERA) Equipment/Materials.
lender.occupational_info: This work is need for my family daily bread.

lender.name: Tammy

lender.loan_because: I want to help others achieve their business goals and help improve their lives. Through Kiva, I can do this and see the impact my contribution has made. Thank you Kiva.org!

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: why the heck not?

lender.name: Bernardo
lender.loan_because: I believe that people can improve their lives if they are given a chance. If we support entrepreneurship we can make a difference!
lender.occupational_info: I work in advertising and sport events.

lender.name: Louise

lender.loan_because: to give others a feeling of contribution

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: There are those who need it more than I do.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently attending a university working toward a PhD in applied physics.

lender.name: Tiffany
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of hope, the beauty of dreams, and the courage of belief. Every voice, every dollar, every outstretched hand makes a difference. lender.occupational_info: I am an artist and a writer and sometimes I design, act, and produce. My love is a magician. We believe in following your heart, and being led by Hope.

lender.loan_because: our family is so blessed.
lender.occupational_info: I am a mother and spend my time trying to help the teachers in my children's school do their jobs.

lender.occupational_info: I lend to entrepreneurs that specialise in services related to tofu, beancurd, and other soya products, plus rice, fruit, and vegetables.

lender.name: kenn
lender.loan_because: i love...

lender.name: Howie
lender.loan_because: When I stumbled on Kiva, I knew I'd found the perfect way to honor Christmas for my family and someone else's.
lender.occupational_info: I help college students with their learning, family issues, and school activities.

lender.name: Deborah
lender.loan_because: I want people to have pride of accomplishment and an increase in feelings of self-worth. Hopefully they will instill these same ideas in their children, family, and friends. The world will be a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a cancer treatment facility doing secretarial work.

lender.name: yvonne
lender.loan_because: I want to do something to help others make their lives better.
lender.occupational_info: Today I enjoy retirement and spend as much time as I can with my little grandson.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I want to help make a positive impact in someones life. I am fortunate enough to be able to. And I am glad to help someone who wants to better their lot in life.

lender.name: zekenzoey

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I am blessed in so many ways.

lender.name: Ronda

lender.name: Andy
lender.loan_because: My passion is to help business owners and I see Kiva as a naturals extension of what I do. I like to help entrepreneurs who are trying to help themselves, but who may be faced with exceptionally difficult odds.
lender.occupational_info: I help independent business owners to improve their businesses and improve their lives. I do this by helping them implement strategies that help make more money, build effective teams and control their time.

lender.name: Jing Mei
lender.loan_because: i think everyone deserves a chance to make their life what they envision

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I would like to see people succeed and make a better life for themselves. Hopefully, someday, they too can make a difference in someones life.

lender.name: EdT
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me and my family tremendously. Loaning allows us to help others and bless them in some small way.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computer software for a large company in the Unites States.

lender.name: Mary Agnes
lender.loan_because: I once lost a pair of silver scissors that were my Mother's and very meaningful to her. I donate to Kiva applicants who mention they will buy scissors in their business plan. This is my way of giving those scissors back to the universe in a wonderful way.
lender.occupational_info: I do secretarial and administration work at a university graduate school. I'm mostly on the computer!

lender.occupational_info: I love working with children and hope to eventually open up a care facility for familys that can not afford daycare at full price.

lender.occupational_info:
Malcolm is a thought leader and facilitator on city competitiveness and economic development through technology enabled innovation and entrepreneurship.
He works with local and central governments, industry and academia to achieve powerful local outcomes via the development of high skilled jobs, innovation and entrepreneurship within city economies.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of grass roots entrepreneurial programs to change lives. I've travelled in rural Cambodia, Laos and Vietnam and know what a difference we can make.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: I want to help others and make money in a way I can feel good about.
lender.occupational_info: I'm on long-term disability recovering from cancer. I hope to return to my tech support job with a major US telecom company.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: As a cancer survivior, I have been given I second chance. I would like to be a part of that for someone else
lender.occupational_info: I am a wife, a mother, and a friend to many. I am working on staying healthy and strong.

lender.name: Rosa
lender.loan_because: I think this is a fabulous concept. I can help someone and empower them at the same time. So much better than a hand out.

lender.name: Bob
